definition: to pick (flowers)/to pinch/to nip/to pinch off/to clutch/(slang) to fight
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to count with one's fingers/on the spot calculation

sentences.english: Anakin accused Padmé of betraying him, and used the Force the strangle her.
sentences.chinese: 阿纳金谴责帕德梅背叛他，并用原力掐她。

sentences.english: Except the tendency to squeeze others on their throat occasionally, he is a good-tempered guy.
sentences.chinese: 除了偶尔掐人脖子之外，他还算是个好脾气的家伙。

sentences.english: At the same time he pinched her sore hand.
sentences.chinese: 同时他在她那只受了伤的手上掐了一把。

sentences.english: She pinched her ear and winced at the pain.
sentences.chinese: 她掐了一下耳朵感到疼痛。

sentences.english: The hollowing of that pitiless nail could be felt there.
sentences.chinese: 已经可以感到那无情指甲的掐印。

sentences.english: Poor thing had bruises all up her arms, due to I started pinching her.
sentences.chinese: 可怜她的胳膊上到处都是伤痕，全是我给掐的。

sentences.english: When the sixth had struck, he snuffed the candle with his fingers.
sentences.chinese: 第六响敲过以后，他用手指掐熄了烛芯。

sentences.english: We can congratulate our teammate without ever grabbing her ass .
sentences.chinese: 我们不会在祝贺朋友时，顺便掐一把她的屁股。

sentences.english: My Christ-portion knew that pinching was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我最基督的那部分知道，掐人是不对的。

sentences.english: The wood was so rotten you could put your finger through it.
sentences.chinese: 木头已经朽了，用手指一掐就是一个窟巄。

sentences.english: Cho 's wife or not, the man will be its Qia fainted.
sentences.chinese: 赵某的妻子不愿意，该男子就将其掐昏。

sentences.english: And when I ate bread I usually drink some water to make sure I won't be chocked.
sentences.chinese: 当我吃面包我通常喝一些水，以确保我不会掐。

sentences.english: Lightly pinch the next one sticks it to soak in the water can quickly grow roots.
sentences.chinese: 随便掐下一个枝，把它泡在水里就能很快长出根来。

sentences.english: There is no doubt that this will be an evening of comic heckling.
sentences.chinese: 看来这一晚必定会是喜剧互掐之夜。

sentences.english: Aunt Sally kissed her lightly on the cheek and squeezed Fannie gently.
sentences.chinese: 萨莉舅妈轻轻地吻了她的脸颊，温柔地掐了一下她。

sentences.english: Type his name with "choke" and see Carmelo Anthony literally choking him.
sentences.chinese: 再输入并带上“窒息”，安东尼真的在掐他。

definition: to pinch (with one's fingers)/to knead/to make up
to seize/to clutch/to grab firmly and pull
to beat with the fist/to hammer/to cudgel
erhua variant of 使勁|使劲[shi3 jin4]
to hug/to embrace/to hold in one's arms
to draw towards oneself/to gather/to gather up (one's gown, sleeves etc)/to grab (money)/to extort
to stab/to poke/to prod/to nudge/to disclose
to hold/to grasp/to clench (one's fist)/to master/classifier: a handful
